Application.Management

Class DeletedScenarioManagementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Management.DeletedScenarioManagementController

  • @SessionAttributes(value="scenarioId")
 @Controller
public class DeletedScenarioManagementController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing Scenario that have been marked as 'Deleted' and hidden.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • getDeletedScenarios

        @RequestMapping(value="/scenario-deleted",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String getDeletedScenarios(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Loads the page for viewing deleted Scenario.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        Returns:
        "scenario-deleted" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • getDeletedScenarioDetails

        @ResponseBody
 @RequestMapping(value="/getDeletedScenarioDetails",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getDeletedScenarioDetails(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="idScenario")
                                                                                                                                                 int idDeletedScenario)
        Returns the details about a given Scenario specified via its identifier.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        idDeletedScenario - Integer indicating the identifier of a Scenario.
        Returns:
        JSON formatted string containing the information about the requested Scenario.
